remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是可讓 ASP.NET 產生的例外狀況資訊的 HTTP 特定的例外狀況類別。The class is an HTTP-specific exception class that enables ASP.NET to generate exception information. 如需有關擲回和處理例外狀況的詳細資訊，請參閱[例外狀況](~/docs/standard/exceptions/index.md)。For more information about throwing and handling exceptions, see [Exceptions](~/docs/standard/exceptions/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別，以引發自訂的例外狀況。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to raise customized exceptions. `Button_Click`方法會判斷哪一個按鈕已按下，，然後再呼叫其中一個`CheckNumber`或`CheckBoolean`方法。The `Button_Click` method determines which button was clicked, and then calls either the `CheckNumber` or `CheckBoolean` method. 如果使用者輸入的值，在文字方塊中沒有對應至預期的類型，例外狀況會建立並擲回的錯誤類型為基礎的自訂訊息。If the user-entered value in the text box does not correspond to the expected type, an exception is created and thrown with a customized message based on the error type. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
